version_description: - Updated for iPhone 5 (4 inch retina screen)

- Completely new design
- Shows the notes (with octave) as you play them
- Shows the exact frequency being played
- Shows deviation in cents
- Improved Tone Generator
Added the ability to set the frequency of the A above middle C (Concert A Pitch) to be used as the reference for tuning.

Fixed a bug that caused a crash in iOS 9 devices.
This update contains minor stability and performance improvements.
